statements: SELECT * FROM IndoorAirQualityData;
SELECT sensor_id, location_id, timestamp FROM IndoorAirQualityData;
SELECT * FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location_id, humidity FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-15';
SELECT reading_id, timestamp, temperature FROM IndoorAirQualityData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT reading_id, sensor_id, timestamp FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE location_id = 'abc123' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 50 AND temperature <= 30 ORDER BY sensor_id, timestamp ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT location_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM IndoorAirQualityData GROUP BY location_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY location_id
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM IndoorAirQualityData GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY total_readings DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE co2_level > 800
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT id, name, age FROM BuildingOccupants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT id, gender, health_condition FROM BuildingOccupants WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND temperature >= 25.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, age, health_condition FROM BuildingOccupants WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT MAX(co2_level) AS max_co2_level, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT * FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE co2_level > 1000 AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, name, gender FROM BuildingOccupants WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData
SELECT building_id, location FROM BuildingInfo
SELECT name, occupation FROM OccupantInfo WHERE age > 30
SELECT temperature, humidity, CO2_level FROM AirQualityData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM BuildingInfo WHERE floor_count >= 5
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM AirQualityData WHERE CO2_level > 800;
SELECT building_id, location FROM BuildingInfo WHERE floor_count > 5 ORDER BY building_id ASC;
SELECT name, occupation, age FROM OccupantInfo WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityData, BuildingInfo WHERE AirQualityData.CO2_level < 500 AND BuildingInfo.floor_count <= 4;
SELECT * FROM IndoorAirQualityData;
SELECT co2_level, temperature FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE co2_level > 1000;
SELECT building_name, location FROM GreenBuildingDetails ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT heart_rate, respiratory_rate FROM OccupantHealthData WHERE heart_rate < 60 AND respiratory_rate > 12;
SELECT building_id, COUNT(occupant_id) AS total_occupants FROM BuildingOccupants GROUP BY building_id;
SELECT * FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT building_name, location FROM GreenBuildingDetails WHERE construction_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT occupant_id, heart_rate FROM OccupantHealthData ORDER BY heart_rate DESC
SELECT building_id, COUNT(occupant_id) AS occupant_count FROM BuildingOccupants GROUP BY building_id
SELECT id, timestamp, co2_level FROM IndoorAirQualityData WHERE co2_level BETWEEN 400 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM indoor_air_quality_data;
SELECT timestamp, co2_level, temperature FROM indoor_air_quality_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT building_id, address FROM building_info ORDER BY building_id DESC;
SELECT name, age, occupation FROM occupant_data WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_type FROM sensor_placement WHERE last_calibration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM indoor_air_quality_data;
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM indoor_air_quality_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_info WHERE construction_year > 2000;
SELECT name, occupation FROM occupant_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT occupant_id, heart_rate FROM health_metrics WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND step_count < 5000;
